attributes.action: Grant amensty to all illegal immigrants presently in the UK for more than 3 years onwards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With over 400,000 legacy cases pending within the UK immigration service and close to a million undocumented migrants across the country. It is important that we address the problem by allowing people already in the country for more than 3 years plus to stay and contribute to the socio-political and economic development of our nation if they are not criminals or a danger to community.
